long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to help the Legacy Streamers group members and partners watch their favorite streamers.

Daily list and fixed hours for the best streamers in each category.

Members of the Legacy group, just need to click on “Iniciar Lurk” in the extension that the system would open and close the tabs of each live on twitch in the right time.
